title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Energy Method (Ritz) and Error Orthogonalization (Galerkin) for indeterminate beams, curved beams, arches and rings; Matrix Force and Displacement Method for Frames and Trusses- Analysis for temperature stress, lack of fit and settlement of supports; Plastic analysis; Variational Approach – Introduction to Finite element Method for frames, trusses and plane stress analysis; Geometric Stiffness Matrix; Compound Structures; Suspension and guyed Bridges; Influence lines.

title: Concepts taught in class
text: Bending moment of determinant and indeterminant structures.

title: Student Opinion
text: The real calculations behind constructing a structure is taught here. The different kind of beam designs are taught. From this subject you will be able to know how beams and columns are designed with calculating the load. Take the course very seriously because it will be the fundamentals of designing a structure.

title: How to Crack the Paper
text: Attend the classes seriously. Solve the tutorials by yourself. Get hold of a book by consulting the prof and practice the problems given in it.

title: Classroom resources
text: Do the tutorials by yourself and solve additional problems from the books given by the prof. Raise any doubt you have because no doubt is silly.
